usage: arcyd fsck [-h] [--fix] [--remote] [--verbose]

Check the Arcyd files for consistency and fix any issues.

optional arguments:
  -h, --help     show this help message and exit
  --fix          resolve issues that are detected, where possible.
  --remote       also check remote resources pointed to by the file system.
                 e.g. git remotes.
  --verbose, -v  verbose output.
